description: Updates the data for a thing. Requires permission to access the UpdateThing action.

parameters.name: thingName
parameters.description: The name of the thing to update. You can't change a thing's name. To change a thing's name, you must create a new thing, give it the new name, and then delete the old thing.

parameters.name: attributePayload
parameters.description: A list of thing attributes, a JSON string containing name-value pairs. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"name1\":\"value2\"}} This data is used to add new attributes or update existing attributes. attributes (dict) --- A JSON string containing up to three key-value pair in JSON format. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"string1\":\"string2\"}} (string) --- (string) --- merge (boolean) --- Specifies whether the list of attributes provided in the AttributePayload is merged with the attributes stored in the registry, instead of overwriting them. To remove an attribute, call UpdateThing with an empty attribute value.

nested_params.name: attributes
nested_params.description: A JSON string containing up to three key-value pair in JSON format. For example: {\"attributes\":{\"string1\":\"string2\"}}

nested_params.name: merge
nested_params.description: Specifies whether the list of attributes provided in the AttributePayload is merged with the attributes stored in the registry, instead of overwriting them. To remove an attribute, call UpdateThing with an empty attribute value.
